text: Daniel "Danny" Leiner (May 13, 1961 â€“ October 18, 2018) was an American movie director. His credits include The Great New Wonderful, Harold & Kumar Go to White Castle, Dude, Where's My Car?, Layin' Low, and Time Expired. Leiner also directed a wide range of television, including Arrested Development, Everwood, Gilmore Girls, Freaks and Geeks, Sports Night, Felicity, Action, The Tick, MTV's Austin Stories and HBO's The Mind of the Married Man, The Sopranos, and How to Make It in America. He also directed an episode of The Office entitled "WUPHF.com." ==Early life== Leiner was born Daniel Leiner in Brooklyn, New York on May 13, 1961. ==Death== On October 18, 2018, Leiner died from lung cancer in Los Angeles, California at the age of 57.Danny Leiner, Director of 'Dude, Where's My Car?' and 'Harold & Kumar Go to White Castle,' Dies at 57 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1961 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American television directors Category:Movie directors from New York City Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles
title: Danny Leiner
